column4: when installing linux driver (which is a simple sh "file"), its telling me to exit X-server.  Is this implying to exit the GUI and be at a root terminal ?
That driver is already in ubuntu, don't install nvidias .run file.
- if I did want to install a updated driver though, how would I exit X server todo this installation properly? ( will I ever need to ? )
When nvidia release a new one, it will e added to Ubuntu a short while later. No need for manual intervention.
